description.tooltip: Découpage de l'utilisation de la mémoire par clerks
description.label: Utilisation des memory clerks

queries.query: SELECT TOP(10) mc.[type] AS [Memory Clerk Type], CAST((SUM(mc.pages_kb)/1024.0) AS DECIMAL (15,2)) AS [Memory Usage (MB)] FROM sys.dm_os_memory_clerks AS mc WITH (NOLOCK) GROUP BY mc.[type] ORDER BY SUM(mc.pages_kb) DESC OPTION (RECOMPILE);
